Class EntityManager

A class that allows to easly manage the entities. At runtime all entities will have an unique Id and an list of component types. You must create Entity from the EntityManager. He is smart enough to recycle Ids and get quite fast the components from an entity.

Adding a component type in the list of component types associated to an entity.

Declaration
public void AddComponent(Entity entity, Type componentType)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Entity entity

The entity that will receive the component type. (Must exist)
System.Type componentType

The type of the component that will be inserted to the entity. (Must inherit from IComponent)
Remarks

You shoud must use typeof(YourComponent) for the component type.

Destroy(Entity)

Destroy an given entity that must exists for the entityManager. The entity Id will now be free to be taken for another entity.
